title: How F-ed is Facebook?
description:
Does a bad showing on the stock market, compounding legal woes, and a drop in usage spell big problems for the tech juggernaut? Recode reporter Shirin Ghaffaryjoins us to tell us about Facebook’s losing streak. 

Read Shirin’s article: Facebook's total user base declined for the first time
